name: ⑨弾幕
description:
-----Method of operation------

Move slide bomb? Since the 2-point touch operation has not been confirmed, it may freeze or be forcibly terminated.

[Known bug]

・ Forced termination during the game ・ Forced termination when notifications such as LINE come [Scheduled to be updated]

・ Fix bugs ・ Add stages If you have any bugs or requests, please contact us at the email address below.
